thread.title: Is Sunil Grover Quitting The Kapil Sharma Show?
thread.title_full: Is Sunil Grover Quitting The Kapil Sharma Show?

author: Divya Rao
title: Is Sunil Grover Quitting The Kapil Sharma Show?
text:
Divya Rao Mar . 20 . 2017 Kapil Sharma, Sunil Grover 
Kapil Sharma and Sunil Grover got into a nasty fight onboard a flight when the crew was returning from a show in Australia. A drunk Kapil hurled abuses at Grover, much to his surprise, and later got into a scuffle with him. Grover even apologised to his co-passengers on Kapil’s behalf. 
Kapil spoke to HT about the fight and said he doesn’t remember anything. 
Mujhe yaad nahi. Actually hamari har flight main ladai hoti hai. Har jagah ladai hot hai. It is a healthy fight… We fight for work… We fight for good work. 
A source close to Sunil Grover told HT the opposite. 
Sunil is not coming back on The Kapil Sharma Show. He had already recorded the episodes for this weekend (March 18-19) . But he is not returning to the show. Abb bahot ho gaya. Agar Kapil ka yehi rawaiya raha toh aur log bhi nikal jayenge (enough is enough,if Kapil continues in this manner others will also quit) 
Man, this is really sad. It’ll be such a shame to see our favourite comedians part ways. 5
